Wider Soundstage

Life P2’s graphene drivers oscillate with excessive precision to deliver you sound with extraordinary accuracy and an ultra-realistic listening expertise.

Incredible Call Quality

Utilizing the newest cVc noise discount expertise and 4 microphones (2 per earbud), Life P2 wi-fi earbuds improve voice decide up and take away background noises—Ideal for dwelling places of work.

On-The-Go Listening

Enjoy 7 hours of listening from a single cost, and lengthen it to 40 hours with the compact charging case. For a fast increase of energy while you’re on the transfer, cost the earbuds for simply 10 minutes and get 1 hour of listening.

Simple Secure Fit

Key Features

Crystal-Clear Calls: 4 microphones with the newest cVc noise discount expertise spotlight your voice whereas decreasing background sounds.

Expertly Tuned Sound: Graphene drivers produce a wider soundstage with distinctive accuracy and readability.

aptX Technology: Your music is transferred on the highest attainable high quality to protect the sound and offer you an distinctive listening expertise with CD-like audio high quality.

Waterproof Casing: Life P2’s IPX7-rated safety defends your earbuds towards liquids. The included charging case has IPX3-rated safety.

Comfortable Fit: Select from a variety of EarTips in a number of sizes.

Note:

Check the video above for directions on the way to use and reset Life P2.

The true wi-fi earbuds have an IPX7 Waterproof score underneath IEC customary 60529, which implies they’re designed to deal with rain and exercise circumstances. The earbuds usually are not designed for swimming, showering, or publicity to pool or ocean water. Do not put on the earbuds in a sauna or steam room.

The charging case just isn’t waterproof.

The waterproof perform’s effectiveness could scale back over time on account of day by day use.

Playtime varies based on quantity and audio content material.

When having fun with the immersive listening expertise, make sure you take note of your private security.
